recipe.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipe.ingredients: chicken breast, noodles, chicken brooth, veggies of choice
recipe.directions: Boil chicken until it is about 145 degrees. Next drain some of the water add your veggies and chicken brooth boil for 5 mins and lastly add your noodles and simmer until noodles and veggies are cooked to your liking.

recipe.title: Salsa
recipe.ingredients: Canned tomatoes, Jalapenos, Onion, garlic and salt
recipe.directions: Smash tomatoes, chop jalapenos and onion. Mix in bowl add salt and garlic to taste.
